bug.summary: The website hangs when opening a previously saved file
bug.description:
While importing the data I have encountered that page become unresponsive. Steps I have followed:-
Edited a NER task, saved the labelled file. Opened the file in UDT to modify some labels.
The tab in chrome becomes totally unresponsive I have to kill the process. In the dev tools I am getting the following error hope it helps. <denchmark-code>index.js:1 Warning: Maximum update depth exceeded. This can happen when a component calls setState inside useEffect, but useEffect either doesn't have a dependency array, or one of the dependencies changes on every render. in Unknown (at App.js:20) in ToastProvider (at App.js:19) in LabelHelpProvider (at App.js:18) in AuthProvider (at App.js:17) in AppConfigProvider (at App.js:16) in ThemeProvider (at Theme/index.js:21) in Unknown (at App.js:15) in App (at src/index.js:5) </denchmark-code>
